content.p: Find a research programme: Find out more Before you submit your application, you are required to be assigned a supervisor from the respective School/Department. Please find below the step-by-step guide for your reference. 1. You will have to discuss your proposed project with a relevant supervisor. Kindly prepare the following before submitting your enquiry to the respective School Director of Research or PGR Programme Director. This allows the directors to identify a potential supervisor that coincides with your research interests. 2. When the documents are ready, please send them to the PGR Advisor of the respective School/Department: Please consult the Graduate School if you require further assistance. Once you've found the right research opportunity and potential supervisors have been identified and appointed, you can submit your application. Submit General enquiries: +60 3 8924 8000 Monday - Friday 9:00am - 5:30pm (Except on public holidays) Programme enquiries: +60 3 8924 8686 Monday - Saturday 9:00am - 5:30pm Jalan Broga, 43500 Semenyih Selangor Darul Ehsan Malaysia
